text: Despoina Theodoridou (born 25 May 1978) is a Greek former synchronized swimmer. Despoina competed in the women's duet at the 2000 Summer Olympics with Christina Thalassinidou and finished in thirteenth place. == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Greek synchronized swimmers Category:Olympic synchronized swimmers of Greece Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 2000 Summer Olympics
title: Despoina Theodoridou
